title: The Hero (♀) Hypnotized The Demon King (♀) - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Dark   Death   Demon Lord   Demons   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Heartwarming   Heroes   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Multiple POV   Oneshot   Resurrection   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Unconditional Love
author: Sanrokukyuu   三六九
description:
It has been about a thousand years since the war between the humans and the demons began.

The humans have entrusted their hope and survival to individuals called 'Heroes', while the demons seek to overrun them under the guidance of the Demon King.

On this day, the newest Hero arrives at the Demon King's castle. But she has a secret deep in her heart.>
